resources.string: Something went wrong while setting this toggle.
Try executing the following command from a computer (it\'s one line):
You need to grant the permission \"android.permission.DUMP\" to use this feature.
Samsung device detected! Safe Mode has been automatically enabled for your safety.
Toggling this option off can cause issues after a reboot. Enable Safe Mode or manually toggle this option on and off after a reboot.

SAMSUNG USERS KEEP THIS TURNED ON UNLESS YOU HAVE AN AOSP ROM! 

 Clears any status bar customizations on NORMAL reboot/shutdown and restores them after boot completes. 
 Resets "QS Fancy Pulldown Animation" to default on NORMAL reboot/shutdown and restores saved option after boot completes.
